archimate:Node.name: [NCSA DR] NCSA DR Head Infrastructure (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation:
This logical node hosts the services used to load and fetch data from the DR stores. At least ingest to a DR Store is based on stage-in semantics, since making a R/W Filel system Mount to a client does not provide protection avoid accidentially corrupting the store.
Having a serving base ingest allows independent auditing that DR flows from KNow clients are functioning.
